title: the.raid.redemption.2011.1080p.bluray.x264.DUALAUDIO.DTS.Shadoe.
description:
UPDATE AS OF OCTOBER 15TH,2013... Upon request, I will be seeding this until the end of the month and then my rule from last update applies again..
UPDATE AS OF AUGUST 30th, 2013... Most people just hit and run and lately I have seen no activity for this torrent so I stopped seeding, however if someone wants to download this then just send me a PM for a re-seed :)
So for those that want it here is a version that has the English dubbed audio, as well as, for those that like original language tracks, the Indonesian audio and English Subtitles. Enjoy:)
